name: wnsc-server
description: Backend server for West Nebraska Sports Council

scripts.migrate:event-management: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const db = require('./config/database'); const sql = fs.readFileSync('./scripts/add-event-management.sql', 'utf8'); db.query(sql).then(() => { console.log('Event management tables created successfully'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('Error:', err); process.exit(1); });"
